title: Can't connect to game
body: Went through champ select and I am guessing the game started, since it says my status is "In game" but I'm stuck with a reconnect button that does nothing.

replies.body: Getting stuck at reconnect can indicate an issue with your connection failing to reach the game server.  You'll want to run through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  It may not be enough time to get back into the game at this point, but be sure to test it in a custom to prevent any further leaves.  I hope that helps!
I'm actually stuck in this position too! After spamming the reconnect button, I'm still not even in...
